channel.title: 718 Compass
channel.description:
Okay, I've been searching everywhere over the last few days to find something or a way to improve the 718 compass because noones done it, or atleast released it as far as what I'm seeing, does anyone know how to fix the 718 Compass?!
718 Compass: [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2vlwu2e.png[/img]
I want it like the 562's or how RuneScape's is currently. Please, comment lemme know if you know anything about this.

item.title: 718 Compass
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

There’s something about the 718 revision, if you look in the cache at the compass sprite it’s normal and not messed up… When you get in-game it looks like shit lol

Read full topic

item.title: 718 Compass
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

[quote=“FoHammer, post:3, topic:551589”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670505.msg4483515#msg4483515 date=1432155783]
What are you even asking, exactly?
You literally just say “How do I improve the compass” when like 99% of us don’t even know what’s “wrong” with the compass in the 718
[/quote]

Re-read… I’m asking how could I improve the 718 compass, I’d like it to look like a actual compass, similar to RS3’s, or a 562.[/quote]

So you are asking that you want to change the compass to something more that suits your liking, for example a 562 compass?

If that is the case, you should consider yourself reading where you’re posting this. It is a client-sided issue. And all you would need to do is just change your current compass with the 562 compass. It is either in the sprites folder or packed in the cache.

Read full topic
